channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The AI boom is driving valuations sky-high almost overnight. What could go wrong?
item.description: This year, a handful of top AI startups, from Anthropic to Harvey, have raised not just one giant round of funding, but two or more.

item.title: Insiders say the future of AI will be smaller and cheaper than you think
item.description: Bigger is not necessarily better, these execs say.

item.title: Navies Go to War with the Fleets They Possess
item.description: Congress must focus on shoring up the Navy’s operational strategy and its industrial base in the next U.S. defense budget.

item.title: ‘Santa Rally’ stalls even though a December cut from the Fed is a near certainty
item.description: Unfortunately, the tech sector is spoiling the party: Bitcoin sank to $85K early this morning.

item.title: Trump does not plan to send troops into Venezuela, Sen. Markwayne Mullin says
item.description: Sen. Markwayne Mullin said Sunday that President Trump does not plan to attack Venezuela.

item.title: Washington Gave Bigotry No Sanction. We Should Do the Same
item.description: The measure of American pluralism has never been how well we tolerate those who already think like us.
